title: Zoom Issues
description: Fix Zoom meeting problems including audio, video, and connection issues.

steps.title: Test Audio/Video Before Meeting
steps.instruction: Click Settings → Audio/Video → Test Speaker/Microphone and Test Video. Ensure correct devices are selected.

steps.title: Check Camera/Microphone Permissions
steps.instruction: Windows: Settings → Privacy → Camera/Microphone → Allow Zoom. Mac: System Preferences → Security & Privacy → Camera/Microphone → Enable Zoom.

steps.title: Restart Zoom
steps.instruction: Close Zoom completely, then reopen. For persistent issues, uninstall and reinstall the latest version of Zoom.

steps.title: Check Internet Connection
steps.instruction: Ensure stable internet connection. For better quality, use wired Ethernet instead of Wi-Fi if possible.

steps.title: Update Zoom Client
steps.instruction: Click your profile picture → Check for Updates. Keep Zoom updated to the latest version for best performance.
